targets.rawSql:
DECLARE @BuildStatus TABLE (SourceBranch VARCHAR(50), DefinitionName VARCHAR(50), Result VARCHAR(50))
INSERT INTO @BuildStatus
SELECT VstsBuild.SourceBranch, VstsBuild.DefinitionName, Result 
FROM 
  VstsBuild
  INNER JOIN (SELECT VstsBuild.DefinitionName, SourceBranch, MAX(BuildNumber) AS MaxBuildNumber FROM VstsBuild GROUP BY VstsBuild.DefinitionName, SourceBranch) AS MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch
    ON VstsBuild.DefinitionName = MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch.DefinitionName AND VstsBuild.SourceBranch = MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch.SourceBranch and VstsBuild.BuildNumber = MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch.MaxBuildNumber

UPDATE @BuildStatus SET Result = REPLACE(Result, 'Canceled', '0.5')
UPDATE @BuildStatus SET Result = REPLACE(Result, 'PartiallySucceeded', '0.5')
UPDATE @BuildStatus SET Result = REPLACE(Result, 'Succeeded', '1')
UPDATE @BuildStatus SET Result = REPLACE(Result, 'Failed', '0')


SELECT Result
FROM
@BuildStatus
WHERE SourceBranch = '$BranchName' AND (DefinitionName = 'Build Images')

DECLARE @BuildStatus TABLE (SourceBranch VARCHAR(50), DefinitionName VARCHAR(50), Result VARCHAR(50), QueueTime DATETIME)
INSERT INTO @BuildStatus
SELECT VstsBuild.SourceBranch, VstsBuild.DefinitionName, Result, QueueTime
FROM 
  VstsBuild
  INNER JOIN (SELECT VstsBuild.DefinitionName, SourceBranch, MAX(BuildNumber) AS MaxBuildNumber FROM VstsBuild GROUP BY VstsBuild.DefinitionName, SourceBranch) AS MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch
    ON VstsBuild.DefinitionName = MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch.DefinitionName AND VstsBuild.SourceBranch = MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch.SourceBranch and VstsBuild.BuildNumber = MostRecentBuildsPerDefinitionAndBranch.MaxBuildNumber

UPDATE @BuildStatus SET Result = REPLACE(Result, 'Succeeded', '1')
UPDATE @BuildStatus SET Result = REPLACE(Result, 'Canceled', '0.5')
UPDATE @BuildStatus SET Result = REPLACE(Result, 'Failed', '0')

SELECT TOP 1 RESULT FROM @BuildStatus
WHERE SourceBranch = '$BranchName' AND DefinitionName = 'Longhaul Test Release'
ORDER BY QueueTime DESC

SELECT SUM(BugCount) FROM VstsBug
WHERE Priority = '1' AND InProgress = 'true';

SELECT SUM(BugCount) FROM VstsBug
WHERE Priority = '1';

SELECT SUM(BugCount) FROM VstsBug
WHERE Priority = '2' AND InProgress = 'true';

SELECT SUM(BugCount) FROM VstsBug
WHERE Priority = '2';

SELECT SUM(BugCount) FROM VstsBug
WHERE Priority = 'Other' AND InProgress = 'true';

SELECT SUM(BugCount) FROM VstsBug
WHERE Priority = 'Other';

DECLARE @BugInfo TABLE (AreaPath VARCHAR(200), Priority VARCHAR(200), InProgress VARCHAR(200), BugCount Int)

INSERT INTO @BugInfo
SELECT AreaPath, Priority, Tmp = CASE InProgress WHEN 1 THEN 'Started' WHEN 0 THEN 'NotStarted' END, BugCount FROM VstsBug;

DECLARE @BugDescCounts TABLE (AreaPath VARCHAR(200), Description VARCHAR(200), BugCount Int)

INSERT INTO @BugDescCounts
SELECT AreaPath, Description = CONCAT('(Priority: ', Priority, ') (Status: ', InProgress, ')' ), BugCount FROM @BugInfo

SELECT * FROM @BugDescCounts
PIVOT (
    MAX(BugCount)
    FOR Description IN (
      [(Priority: 1) (Status: Started)],
      [(Priority: 1) (Status: NotStarted)],
      [(Priority: 2) (Status: Started)],
      [(Priority: 2) (Status: NotStarted)],
      [(Priority: Other) (Status: Started)],
      [(Priority: Other) (Status: NotStarted)]
    )) AS Description2
ORDER BY AreaPath ASC

DECLARE @BugInfo TABLE (AreaPath VARCHAR(200), Priority VARCHAR(200), InProgress VARCHAR(200), BugCount Int)

INSERT INTO @BugInfo
SELECT AreaPath, Priority, Tmp = CASE InProgress WHEN 1 THEN 'Started' WHEN 0 THEN 'NotStarted' END, BugCount FROM VstsBug;

DECLARE @BugDescCounts TABLE (AreaPath VARCHAR(200), Description VARCHAR(200), BugCount Int)

INSERT INTO @BugDescCounts
SELECT AreaPath, Description = CONCAT('(Priority: ', Priority, ') (Status: ', InProgress, ')' ), BugCount FROM @BugInfo

SELECT * FROM @BugDescCounts

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let mostRecentTestBuildId = toscalar(connectivity_CL
| where TestInfo_ImagesSourceBranch_s == "$BranchName"
| where TestInfo_TestName_s == "connectivity (single-node)"
| summarize arg_max(TestInfo_TestBuildId_s, TimeGenerated)
| project TestInfo_TestBuildId_s);
connectivity_CL
| where TestInfo_TestBuildId_s == mostRecentTestBuildId
| extend Scenario = strcat(TestInfo_NetworkDescription_s, " | ", TestInfo_HostPlatform_s)
| mv-expand todynamic(TestResultReports_s)
| extend TestName = TestResultReports_s.TestDescription
| extend IsTestPassed = iff(TestResultReports_s.IsPassed == "true", 1, 0)
| project TestName, Scenario, IsTestPassed
| evaluate pivot(Scenario, avg(IsTestPassed))
| where TestName != ""

let mostRecentTestBuildId = toscalar(connectivity_CL
| where TestInfo_ImagesSourceBranch_s == "$BranchName"
| where TestInfo_TestName_s == "connectivity (nested-broker)"
| summarize arg_max(TestInfo_TestBuildId_s, TimeGenerated)
| project TestInfo_TestBuildId_s);
connectivity_CL
| where TestInfo_TestBuildId_s == mostRecentTestBuildId
| extend Scenario = strcat(TestInfo_NetworkDescription_s, " | ", TestInfo_HostPlatform_s)
| mv-expand todynamic(TestResultReports_s)
| extend TestName = TestResultReports_s.TestDescription
| extend IsTestPassed = iff(TestResultReports_s.IsPassed == "true", 1, 0)
| project TestName, Scenario, IsTestPassed
| evaluate pivot(Scenario, avg(IsTestPassed))
| where TestName != ""

let branchIdentifier = case("$BranchName" == "refs/heads/master", "master", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.0.8", "1.0.8", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.0.9", "1.0.9", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.0.10", "1.0.10", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.1", "1.1", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.2", "1.2", "None");
let mostRecentBuildId = toscalar(longhaul_CL
| where TestInfo_BuildSourceBranch_s == branchIdentifier











| where TestInfo_TestName_s == "longhaul (single-node)"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, TestInfo_TestBuildId_s)



| project TestInfo_TestBuildId_s);
longhaul_CL

| where TestInfo_TestBuildId_s == mostRecentBuildId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by TestInfo_HostPlatform_s
| mv-expand todynamic(TestResultReports_s)
| extend TestDescription = TestResultReports_s.TestDescription
| extend Result = TestResultReports_s.IsPassed
| extend Result = iff(TestResultReports_s.IsPassed == "true", 1, 0)
| extend HostPlatform = TestInfo_HostPlatform_s
| project HostPlatform, TestDescription, Result
| evaluate pivot(HostPlatform, avg(Result))

let branchIdentifier = case("$BranchName" == "refs/heads/master", "master", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.0.8", "1.0.8", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.0.9", "1.0.9", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.0.10", "1.0.10", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.1", "1.1", "$BranchName" == "refs/heads/release/1.2", "1.2", "None");
let mostRecentBuildId = toscalar(longhaul_CL
| where TestInfo_BuildSourceBranch_s == branchIdentifier











| where TestInfo_TestName_s == "longhaul (nested-broker)" or TestInfo_TestName_s == "longhaul (nested-non-broker)"
| summarize arg_max(TestInfo_TestBuildId_s, TimeGenerated)
| project TestInfo_TestBuildId_s);

longhaul_CL
| where TestInfo_TestBuildId_s == mostRecentBuildId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by TestInfo_HostPlatform_s, TestInfo_TestName_s
| mv-expand todynamic(TestResultReports_s)
| extend TestDescription = TestResultReports_s.TestDescription
| extend Result = TestResultReports_s.IsPassed
| extend Result = iff(TestResultReports_s.IsPassed == "true", 1, 0)
| extend HostPlatform = TestInfo_HostPlatform_s
| extend TestName = TestInfo_TestName_s
| extend TestContext = strcat(HostPlatform, " | ", TestName)
| project TestDescription, TestContext, Result
| evaluate pivot(TestContext, avg(Result))
